title: Nick Viall, Rachel’s Favorite Ex, Stops By
description:
Krystal Nielson is back as Rachel’s guest co-host for the day. Plus, former Bachelor and Rachel’s favorite ex-boyfriend, Nick Viall, joins the ladies. Nick talks about the “civil war” he believes is brewing in the franchise, his thoughts on the newest Bachelor, Peter, and his one issue with “The Bachelor” alum Raven.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:
